Description: Up for auction is a limited edition Third Man model electric guitar from Loog Guitars made for Record Store Day 2015. Listing includes the guitar and accessories (guitar stand and gig bag) which are still new in box. The Third Man strap made for this model is also included. Will ship to you in the original boxes. This guitar was a demo model in our shop so it has pick marks over strings area/pickguard and some light scuffs, but is fully-functional and in excellent condition. LOOG GUITAR WILL SHIP WITH NECK REMOVED FROM BODY AND PACKED IN ORIGINAL BOX. Loog Guitars are 3-string / 18 fret electric guitars made for all ages and super fun to play! From the Loog Guitars website about this model: Boy, are we proud of this one: we made an Electric Loog in collaboration with Jack White’s Third Man Records! The Third Man Electric Loog is sold exclusively by Third Man Records at their Nashville store and also through their website. Released as part of their 2015 Record Store Day celebrations, these bad boys come in custom yellow-on-black and black-on-yellow versions, and packed into a newly-designed box. Other Third Man Electric Loog exclusive details: Vinyl pickguard pressed at Nashville's United Record PressingCustom TMR logo stainless steel plateMatte finishThe rest is just your regular Electric Loog magic – tweaked to convey the signature TMR black-and-yellow awesomeness. You can also get exclusive accessories for your new TMR Electric Loog Guitar: there’s a nifty little backpack, a striped guitar strap made for little ones and a guitar stand.
Title: Third Man Electric Loog Guitar + Accessories RSD 2015

NameValueList.Name: Bundle Description
Value: Limited Edition Record Store Day 2015 Third Man model Loog Electric Guitar, Third Man Strap, Loog Guitar Stand, and Third Man Gig Bag.
